author: qhaleesi
title: SAVINGS CULTURE AMONG THE UNBANKED
description: The unbanked have no access to friendly savings systems that encourage micro saving of $0.5-$10 per week/month regularly.
solution: Savings pooled and traded in the Crypto Markets to raise funds for livelihood, solar cash power and housing. Aim is to get them digital IDs.
experience: In 2017, we did a 600 members pilot savings project for community members to own solar powered brand new laptops.  ++PICTURES ATTACHED.++
